Description.Name: Additional Mechbay 1
Description.Details: Allows the dropping of one additional 'Mech. Requires the Command Console upgrade to control the Pilot! So the docking cradles were salvaged for parts and scrap but the mounting points are still intact. I can get my techs to work ripping out those 'Mech cradles, Commander, but it's gonna take a while to get everything bolted onto our Leopard. While I can handle the upgrades, we'll need further equipment and pilot training to be able to fully control the 'Mech. Until then, we'll have to let the pilot babysit the AI in the 'Mech.

AssignedCastDescription: With this upgrade we can support dropping an additional 'Mech onto the battlefield.
